p.k: Leslie calls Gumball's bluff. / Gumball decides to put Mr. Small's eco-friendly principles to the test but it doesn't quite go as planned. / Sarah finds a notebook from an awesome store! / Clayton shapeshifts into people to take their detentions for money. He starts framing people for misdemeanors so GB and DW must track him down to stop him. / A group of kids get locked in the school after their parents have a charity gala. They appoint Gumball as leader to get them out but it leads to chaos.
